title: 1,2,4-Triazole-Based First-in-Class Non-Nucleoside Inhibitors of the Bacterial Enzyme MraY.
abstract: MraY is an essential bacterial enzyme for peptidoglycan synthesis in cell walls and serves as a promising but unrealized target for developing effective antibacterial drugs. Nature has provided a remarkable array of nucleoside inhibitors of MraY, and researchers have skillfully refined these structures to develop inhibitors that effectively mimic natural products.
